name: 2024 the 8th International Conference on Measurement Instrumentation and Electronics
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, relevance to conference, contributions, and presentation. For accepted papers, it will be published in ICMIE 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services.
